sentence: Georgians are feeling a little bit of relief after Governor Brian Kemp signed a law suspending Georgias motor fuel tax through the end of May.
title: Georgians now feeling some relief at the pump after gas tax suspension

sentence: Georgia On March 18, Georgia Governor Brian Kemp signed a bill to temporarily suspend the state's excise tax on motor fuel sales.
author: Sarah Ewall-Wice
title: New York joins growing number of states attempting to provide relief at the pump
